00025 // Curl
00026 class Curl {
00027 public:
00028     static const size_t DEF_LOW_SPEED_TIME = 3; // seconds
00029     static const size_t DEL_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT = 10; // bytes/s
00030     static const size_t DEL_TIMEOUT = 10; // seconds
00031     friend class CurlMulti;
00032 
00033     static size_t WriteToStringCallback(void* ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void* puser) {
00034         Curl* pcurl = (Curl*)puser;
00035         pcurl->_output.append((char const*)ptr, size*nmemb);
00036         return size*nmemb;
00037     }
00038 
00039     static int DebugCallback(CURL* pcurl, curl_infotype type, char* data, size_t size, void* puser) {
00040         // ignore tailing cr
00041         if (size > 0) size--;
00042         switch (type) {
00043             case CURLINFO_TEXT:         LSF_LOG_INF("[curl text]: %.*s", size, data); break;
00044             case CURLINFO_HEADER_IN:    LSF_LOG_INF("[curl header in]: %.*s", size, data); break;
00045             case CURLINFO_HEADER_OUT:   LSF_LOG_INF("[curl header out]: %.*s", size, data); break;
00046             case CURLINFO_DATA_IN:      LSF_LOG_INF("[curl data in]: %.*s", size, data); break;
00047             case CURLINFO_DATA_OUT:     LSF_LOG_INF("[curl data out]: %.*s", size, data); break;
00048             case CURLINFO_SSL_DATA_IN:  LSF_LOG_INF("[curl ssl data in]: %.*s", size, data); break;
00049             case CURLINFO_SSL_DATA_OUT: LSF_LOG_INF("[curl ssl data out]: %.*s", size, data); break;
00050             case CURLINFO_END: break;
00051         }
00052         return 0;
00053     }
00054 
00055     static int ProgressCallback(void* puser, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ulnow) {
00056         // Curl* pcurl = (Curl*)puser;
00057         return 0;
00058     }
00059 
00060     static Curl* GetCurlFromNative(CURL* pnative) {
00061         Curl* pcurl;
00062         return curl_easy_getinfo(pnative, CURLINFO_PRIVATE, &pcurl) == CURLE_OK ? pcurl : nullptr;
00063     }
00064 
00065     std::string UrlEscape(std::string const& input) {
00066         std::string tmp = curl_easy_escape(_handle, input.c_str(), input.size());
00067         return tmp;
00068     }
00069 
00070 public:
00071     // constructor
00072     Curl() : _handle(curl_easy_init()) {
00073         if (!*this) return;
00074         // forbid progress meter
00075         SetOpt(CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 1);
00076         // forbid signal for thread safty
00077         SetOpt(CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, 1);
00078         // init private
00079         SetOpt(CURLOPT_PRIVATE, this);
00080     }
00081     ~Curl() { if (*this) curl_easy_cleanup(_handle); }
00082 
00083     explicit operator bool() const { return _handle != nullptr; }
00084     bool operator<(Curl const& rhs) const { return _handle < rhs._handle; }
00085 
00086     std::string const& Output() const { return _output; }
00087     std::string&& MoveOutput() { return std::move(_output); }
00088     std::string ErrString() const { return curl_easy_strerror(_error); }
00089     bool Success() const { return _error == CURLE_OK; }
00090     CURL* NativeHandle() const { return _handle; }
00091 
00092     // common function
00093     bool Perform() {
00094         _output.clear();
00095         return (_error = curl_easy_perform(_handle)) == CURLE_OK;
00096     }
00097 
00098     // get option
00099     template<typename ParamType>
00100     bool GetInfo(CURLINFO info, ParamType param) {
00101         return curl_easy_getinfo(_handle, info, param) == CURLE_OK;
00102     }
00103 
00104     std::string EffectiveUrl() {
00105         char* purl;
00106         if (!GetInfo(CURLINFO_EFFECTIVE_URL, &purl)) return "";
00107         return purl;
00108     }
00109 
00110     // set option
00111     void Reset() { curl_easy_reset(_handle); }
00112 
00113     template<typename ParamType>
00114     bool SetOpt(CURLoption option, ParamType param) {
00115         return (_error = curl_easy_setopt(_handle, option, param)) == CURLE_OK;
00116     }
00117 
00118     bool SetUrl(std::string const& string) { return SetOpt(CURLOPT_URL, string.c_str()); }
00119     bool SetUrl(char const* char_string) { return SetOpt(CURLOPT_URL, char_string); }
00120 
00121     bool SetPostData(std::string const& string) {
00122         _http_body = string;
00123         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_POSTFIELDSIZE, _http_body.size())) return false;
00124         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, _http_body.data())) return false;
00125         return true;
00126     }
00127 
00128     bool SetOutputToString() {
00129         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, WriteToStringCallback)) return false;
00130         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, this)) return false;
00131         return true;
00132     }
00133 
00134     bool SetVerbose() {
00135         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 1)) return false;
00136         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_DEBUGFUNCTION, DebugCallback)) return false;
00137         return true;
00138     }
00139 
00140     bool SetProgress() {
00141         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, 0)) return false;
00142         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_PROGRESSFUNCTION, ProgressCallback)) return false;
00143         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_PROGRESSDATA, this)) return false;
00144         return true;
00145     }
00146 
00147     bool SetLowSpeedAbort(size_t low_speed_time = DEF_LOW_SPEED_TIME, size_t low_speed_limit = DEL_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT) {
00148         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_TIME, low_speed_time)) return false;
00149         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT, low_speed_limit)) return false;
00150         return true;
00151     }
00152 
00153     bool SetTimeout(size_t timeout = DEL_TIMEOUT) {
00154         if (!SetOpt(CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, timeout)) return false;
00155         return true;
00156     }
00157 
00158 private:
00159     CURL* _handle = nullptr;
00160     std::string _output;
00161     std::string _http_body;
00162     CURLcode _error = CURLE_OK;
00163 };

00167 class SharedCurl : public std::shared_ptr<Curl> {
00168 public:
00169     using base_type = std::shared_ptr<Curl>;
00170     SharedCurl() : base_type(new Curl) {}
00171 };

00174 // CurlMulti
00175 class CurlMulti : public lsf::basic::Singleton<CurlMulti>, public lsf::basic::Error {
00176 public:
00177     using finish_callback_type = std::function<void(SharedCurl)>;
00178 
00179     // add timer callback
00180     static void AddTimerCallback(CURLM* multi_handle, long timeout_milli, void* puser) {
00181         // just invoke timeout immediately
00182         if (timeout_milli <= 0) timeout_milli = 1;
00183 
00184         // add new timer
00185         int timer_fd = IOService::Instance()->AsyncAddTimerOnce(timeout_milli, [](int timer_fd) {
00186             // remove timer fd
00187             CurlMulti::Instance()->_timer_set.erase(timer_fd);
00188 
00189             // notify action
00190             int running_handles = 0;
00191             auto ret = curl_multi_socket_action(CurlMulti::Instance()->_handle, CURL_SOCKET_TIMEOUT, 0, &running_handles);
00192             if (ret != CURLM_OK) {
00193                 LSF_LOG_ERR("socket action failed, fd=%u, %s", timer_fd, curl_multi_strerror(ret));
00194             }
00195 
00196             // check handle
00197             CheckMultiInfo();
00198         });
00199 
00200         // add to set
00201         if (timer_fd) CurlMulti::Instance()->_timer_set.insert(timer_fd);
00202     }
00203 
00204     // handle socket callback
00205     static int HandleSocketCallback(CURL* easy_handle, curl_socket_t sock, int action, void* puser, void* psock) {
00206         // handle action
00207         switch (action) {
00208             case CURL_POLL_IN:
00209             case CURL_POLL_OUT: {
00210                 int flag = (action == CURL_POLL_IN ? IOService::FLAG_READ : IOService::FLAG_WRITE);
00211                 IOService::Instance()->AsyncRawCallback(sock, flag, [](int sockfd, int flags) {
00212                     // init curl flags
00213                     int curl_flags = 0;
00214                     if (flags & IOService::FLAG_READ)  curl_flags |= CURL_CSELECT_IN;
00215                     if (flags & IOService::FLAG_WRITE) curl_flags |= CURL_CSELECT_OUT;
00216                     if (flags & IOService::FLAG_ERR)   curl_flags |= CURL_CSELECT_ERR;
00217 
00218                     // notify action
00219                     int running_handles = 0;
00220                      auto ret = curl_multi_socket_action(CurlMulti::Instance()->_handle, sockfd, curl_flags, &running_handles);
00221                     if (ret != CURLM_OK) {
00222                         LSF_LOG_ERR("socket action failed, fd=%u, %s", sockfd, curl_multi_strerror(ret));
00223                     }
00224 
00225                     // check handle
00226                     CheckMultiInfo();
00227 
00228                     // if all done, kill all timer
00229                     if (running_handles <= 0) {
00230                         for (auto timer_fd : CurlMulti::Instance()->_timer_set) {
00231                             IOService::Instance()->AsyncCloseTimer(timer_fd);
00232                         }
00233                         CurlMulti::Instance()->_timer_set.clear();
00234                     }
00235                 });
00236                 break;
00237             }
00238 
00239             case CURL_POLL_REMOVE: {
00240                 IOService::Instance()->AsyncCancel(sock);
00241                 break;
00242             }
00243         }
00244         return 0;
00245     }
00246 
00247     static void CheckMultiInfo() {
00248         // traverse all curl
00249         int pending;
00250         CURLMsg* pmsg = nullptr;
00251         while ((pmsg = curl_multi_info_read(CurlMulti::Instance()->_handle, &pending))) {
00252             switch (pmsg->msg){
00253                 case CURLMSG_DONE: {
00254                     // release from multi
00255                     curl_multi_remove_handle(CurlMulti::Instance()->_handle, pmsg->easy_handle);
00256 
00257                     // get curl instance
00258                     auto& curl_map = CurlMulti::Instance()->_curl_map;
00259                     auto iter = curl_map.find(pmsg->easy_handle);
00260                     if (iter == curl_map.end()) {
00261                         LSF_LOG_ERR("cant get curl when process done, handle=%x", pmsg->easy_handle);
00262                         continue;
00263                     }
00264 
00265                     // set result
00266                     iter->second.first->_error = pmsg->data.result;
00267 
00268                     // callback
00269                     if (iter->second.second) iter->second.second(iter->second.first);
00270 
00271                     // release obj
00272                     curl_map.erase(iter);
00273                 }
00274                 break;
00275 
00276                 default: break;
00277             }
00278         }
00279     }
00280 
00281 public:
00282     CurlMulti() {}
00283     ~CurlMulti() {if (*this) curl_multi_cleanup(_handle); }
00284     explicit operator bool() const { return _handle != nullptr; }
00285 
00286     bool Init() {
00287         // check already init
00288         if (_handle) return true;
00289 
00290         // init global handle
00291         if (curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_ALL) != 0) {
00292             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00293             return false;
00294         }
00295 
00296         // check async dns:
00297         // because we forbid signal in Curl constructor
00298         // so we must make sure libcurl support async dns lookup
00299         // otherwise dns lookup may last forever
00300         auto* pinfo = curl_version_info(CURLVERSION_NOW);
00301         if (!(pinfo->features & CURL_VERSION_ASYNCHDNS)) {
00302             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO + std::string(" Not Support Async DNS"));
00303             return false;
00304         }
00305 
00306         // init multi handle
00307         if ((_handle = curl_multi_init()) == nullptr) {
00308             SetErrString(LSF_DEBUG_INFO);
00309             return false;
00310         }
00311 
00312         // set callback
00313         curl_multi_setopt(_handle, CURLMOPT_SOCKETFUNCTION, HandleSocketCallback);
00314         curl_multi_setopt(_handle, CURLMOPT_TIMERFUNCTION, AddTimerCallback);
00315         return true;
00316     }
00317 
00318     template<typename HandlerType = std::nullptr_t>
00319     bool AddCurl(SharedCurl shared_curl, HandlerType&& handler = nullptr) {
00320         // check input
00321         if (!shared_curl) return false;
00322 
00323         // set callbacks
00324         shared_curl->SetOutputToString();
00325 
00326         // add to map
00327         _curl_map[shared_curl->NativeHandle()] = std::make_pair(shared_curl, std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00328 
00329         // add to handle
00330         curl_multi_add_handle(_handle, shared_curl->NativeHandle());
00331 
00332         return true;
00333     }
00334 
00335     void RemoveCurl(SharedCurl shared_curl) {
00336         _curl_map.erase(shared_curl->NativeHandle());
00337     }
00338 
00339     std::set<int> const& TimerSet() const { return _timer_set; }
00340     std::map<CURL*,std::pair<SharedCurl,finish_callback_type>> const& CurlMap() const { return _curl_map; }
00341 
00342 private:
00343     CURLM* _handle = nullptr;
00344     std::set<int> _timer_set;
00345     std::map<CURL*,std::pair<SharedCurl,finish_callback_type>> _curl_map;
00346 };
00347 
00348 } // end namespace asio

00352 // define hash function
00353 namespace std {
00354 template<>
00355 struct hash<lsf::asio::Curl> {
00356     size_t operator()(lsf::asio::Curl const& curl) const {
00357         return std::hash<char*>()((char*)curl.NativeHandle());
00358     }
00359 };
